field.name: Description
field.text: You recive 16 to all your INT checks and int-related skill checks. You recieve -214 to all your WIS checks and WIL related skill checks.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can steal a total of Lvl skill levels from other people. When a skill level is overwritten by another one, then the target the first skill was stolen from gets it back. This skill may not be kept for more than lvl hours.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can absorb the surface attributes of a non-living substance. For example, if the character wants to absorb a stone surface, his skin gains the hardness of stone, and the limb is unmovable, until the surface is released.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can stick to surfaces, allowing him to runclimb up wall and ceilings as if he was walking normally.

field.name: Description
field.text: You critical fail on all rolls of 1, 2, or 3. You automatically succeed on rolls of 18, 19, and 20.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character takes no damage from physical damage. Crushing attacks tend to splatter the character. Severed limbs in this form are regrown if there is a source of water. Fire damage deals x3 damage. Ice will freeze the character, but no damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: This is a stand in. A character may take a magical spell of any rank as a Trait. They do not need to buy Magical Control, Spellcasting, Faith, Mysticism, etc. The rank of the specific Trait is the rank of the spell. For purposes of control (striking, LVL, etc.), the level at which the Spell Ability has been purchased is used for these calculations. The cost of using the ability is the same Mana Point cost as the spell itself.

example.text: Ignaceousalter-identity is the mutant superhero, Flame-On!The exclamation point is part of the name.. He has the following Arcane Talents: Fireblast at Level 4, Fire Shards at level 4, Flame Shroud at level 1, Living Fire at level 1, and Flame Whip at level 2. Although he feels it was unnecessary, his secret master has been forcing him to train in the mystic arts to learn to control his powers better (Mysticism, level 3). Although he thinks it's bunk, and wasn't necessary, he can certainly use his powers longer nowadays.

field.text: We note that for Flame Whip, Fire Shards, and Fireblast the description in says to roll to determine if Ignaceous strikes. Ignaceous would roll his level he has purchased the skills at, i.e. levels 2, 4, and 4, respectively.

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive plus 1 on ALL non-combat skill rolls, except when hurried.

field.name: Description
field.text: Upon activation, all those that see the character must make a willpower roll at -Lvl*2. If unsuccessful, than those affected are VERY likely to agree with the character, and even less likely to attack him. Lasts for CHA minutes.

field.name: Description
field.text: (Teleportation Dodge) - Character can Blink out of the way of an attack. Roll to dodge at LVL D + (DEX or WIL)

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +2 on academic skill rolls. You recive a +1 when those rolls are rushed or hurried. If you have Mental Training then you receive the +2, hurried or not.

field.name: Description
field.text: No falling damage, crash damage, etc. Character will bounce like a rubber ball.

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive a constant bonus of 2 STR and 2 BLD. You loose one action in combat, permanently. Your speed is reduced by 1 and you are at -1 to all INT and WIS skill rolls.

field.name: Implementation
field.text: Strength += 2*Level; Build += 2*Level; Speed -= 1*Level; Intelligence -= 1*Level; Wisdom -= 1*Level; Height *= pow(1.1,Level); Weight *= pow(1.25,Level);

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can dig a tunnel through almost any substance (even granite and other hard stones) at a rate of Lvl mph

field.name: Description
field.text: Equivalent to a camo skill of lvl, takes 1 action to transform into a new pattern.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character may communicate with lvl animals at a time

field.name: Description
field.text: Character may communicate with lvl demons at a time

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can talk to any machine that is within 20*Lvl feet away. It can be persuaded to do things for the character.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character may communicate with lvl spirits at a time

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can control up to a total ofLVL-22* 30 cp worth of spirits. The spirit must obey any commands until death.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can make lvl targets at a time deaf for 1 turn.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can shift between Lvl other dimensions.

field.name: Description
field.text: Target looses Lvl-2 actions and -2*Lvl to all actions for Lvl d 4-1 turns. Considered an electric attack. Touch.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character does not need to breathe.

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +1 DEX for purposes of contortion, escaping from bonds, and maneuvering in tight places. Opponents trying to put you into a weapon lock or martial arts hold have an extra -2 to succeed.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can steal Lvl HP from target, and gain Lvl HP. Requires touch.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can stealLvl2* 5 MP from target, and gainLvl2* 5 MP. Requires touch.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character gets no additional negatives (or fall unconscious) by dropping below 0 or more HP for Lvl turns.

field.name: Description
field.text: Once per day you may take +2 INT for one skill roll or attribute check. However, you are then at -2 CHR for the rest of the day.

field.name: Description
field.text: +1 on all academic skill rolls. +1 on all WIS checks. +1 LVL to trivia skill. Once per day you may add + 14 to one academic skill roll.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character emits an odor up to 10*lvl2feet away. Purchase for each odor.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can absorb up to 5*Lvl points of damage in energy per turn. Each 5 points absorbed in this way may be converted over to one HP point.

field.name: Description
field.text: For each level, your 'whole side' gains 2 initiative.

field.name: Description
field.text: For each level, your 'whole side' gains 2 initiative.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can create fireworks type flashes within 20 * lvl feet. Anyone within 10*lvl feet from activation area gets - 1 actions for Lvl d 4-1 turns. And is at a -lvl to all actions for that duration.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can fly with a speed of 10*Lvl mph (or 15*Lvl if carrying very little). Wings are a good minor flaw.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can float a few inches above the ground or smooth water. Can move atLvl2mph.

field.name: Description
field.text: Erect a FF with a radius of up to Lvl * 5 ft around character. Can takeLvl2* 25 damage. Opponents are +1 to strike the forcefield. FF regenerates Lvl HP per hour.

field.name: Description
field.text: 4*Lvl gallons of water flow out of the character per second. Requires a STR check at -Lvl or be washed away.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can create a ball of darkness with radius of 15 x Lvl feet

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can create a ball of light with radius of 15 x Lvl feet

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is inhumanly gracefull. His motions are never jerky, always smooth transitions from one position to the next.

field.name: Description
field.text: You gain +1 CHR and +1 BLD. However, this bonus only applies if you have followed a particular diet andor training regimen that day.

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive natural armor of XX+1X where X is equal to half your level in that skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can heal others with a touch. The target gains Lvl HP per turn.

field.name: Description
field.text: You may choose to wear skimpy clothing instead of standard armor. You recive armor equal XXX where X = (CHA-8 +LVL of Beauty + LVL of Fashion Skill). This has no encumberance. You cannot use ability while wearing armor of any kind.

field.name: Description
field.text: or whatever the character normally needs to breeth for lvl hours at a time

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +1 CHR with respect to dealings of the opposite sex. You recive -1 CHR for dealings with the same sex.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character will not age while the power is activated.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is completely immune to all diseases (this includes poison type spells as well).

field.name: Description
field.text: Character takes no damage from falling.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character takes no physical damage and may walk through substances. Note that this does NOT grant the character the ability to fly or hover. He must still walk, though he may dive into a substance.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is completely invisible to visible light. A good minor flaw would be that the character still has a shadow.

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +3 to all BLD checks involving acts of endurance

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can absorb up to 5 * Lvl points of damage from kinetic damage (PSC) per turn. Each 5 points absorbed in this way may be converted over to one HP point.

field.name: Description
field.text: Can throw just about anything with amazing force. Thrown objects deal an additional Lvl D 4 P, S, or C damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character emits enough light to illuminate (like day) an area up to 5*Lvl2in radius.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is completely undetectable when within a bright light that will cover his natural body. Others can still FEEL the character.

field.name: Description
field.text: You earn luck at double the normal rate. However, your max luck is always no more than 2 points.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is completely immune to all magic attacks and effects (good an bad) with 1 success on Lvl D + 10 (roll for good AND bad spells and effects). This does include magic that is thrown at him.

field.name: Description
field.text: You have a natrual ability to sense the presence of magical abilities and objects. You recive the ability to detect magic as if you had Magical Studies LVL2. If you already have that skill, gain +1 LVL to all your rolls.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can manipulate up toLvl3* 10 pounds of metal. Metal pieces may be thrown for an attack (one action) that deals Lvl D 6 SPC damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can melt into a puddle that can flow through cracks, etc. He still weighs the same, and takes up the same volume. He is COMPLETELY defenseless, and can only move at 1 foot per second. 0 Base Armor and immune to physical attacks.

field.name: Description
field.text: Copy the supernatural abilities from other characters as long as the total cost of the abilities has no more than Lvl * 20 character points.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can move through the substance at a rate of a slow walk. Name the substance at purchase time. Character can take anything he is wearing with him, nothing else.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can make 1 target at a time mute for Lvl turns.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character has some form of natural (or mystical) covering that gives himLvl2PSC protection and Lvl U protection.

field.name: Description
field.text: +1 on all CHR based skill checks and attribute checks. You are -3 to all rolls involving seduction.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can see in absolute darkness for up to Lvl*20 feet

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +3 to CHR-related skill or attribute checks that involve diplomacy and negotiation. You also recive +2 to skill checks related to investigation or detecting lies.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character feels NO pain. He is not adversely affected by hit-point loss (though he still looses HP, and will die when -HP is reached).

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can deal damage to invulnerable creatures.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can control up toLvl2* 10 pounds of plant material. Can be used to attack others (takes one action) with the plants, deals Lvl D 6 C damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can take control of another creature if it has fewer character points than he does. His original body appears to be sucked into the new body. If the new body is killed, the character pops back out.

field.name: Description
field.text: Name substance the field is made of. The character is surrounded by a swirling field of substance. Any attacks of this substance that passes through field is reduced to 0 damage. All other damage is reduced by a quarter.

field.name: Description
field.text: Sends the character to a little pocket of reality. He can leave when he wishes, time does not pass outside of pocket. Character still ages within the Reality Pocket.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can regrow any limb at a rate of Lvl pounds per day.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can accelerate the deteriation of organic matter (by a LOT). Character must touch the object. Can rot Lvl pounds of organic matter per second.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character may see anything that is invisible

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can bring himself back to life Lvl number of times. He revives with full abilities, HP, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can detect how many HP the target has.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can detect how many MP the target has.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character is completely undetectable when within a deep shadow that will cover his natural body. Others can still FEEL the character.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can change the form of his body. This includes fairly basic transformation, growing hair, changing skin color, shift body mass, etc.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can shift 4*Lvl attribute points around at a time.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character gains Lvl sizes, gains2LvlStrength, looses Lvl Dex, multiply HP and Base Armor by2Lvl.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character sees the world in slow motion. Character gets lvl additional attempts to parry an attack.

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +2 to deception, forgery, and social engineering type skill rolls. You recive +1 CHR for purposes of seduction and deception.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can emit and hear VERY high and low pitched sounds (think bats here) as well as very quite or loud sounds. Can be used as an attack that deals Lvl D 4 U damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Take control of LVL spirits whose character points are fewer than your own.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can create Lvl clones of himself. Can regenerate a dead clone in a month.

field.name: Description
field.text: Ability to turn into a non-moving statue (name the substance at purchase) at will. Character is COMPLETELY undetectable by ANY means to be anyting but a statue. Statue image and size are what the character looked like upon entering the state.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character steals one ability from the target (requires touch) if that ability cost less than Lvl * 20 cp. If another ability is stolen, the owner of the previous ability gets it back.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can stretch up to Lvl times as long, or 1Lvl times as thin as he currently is. This gives the character an additional 00Lvl*2 personal armor

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can create a trail of substance that is used to surf on. The trail must be anchored to something, but can be as long as needed. Speed is 10*Lvl MPH. It takes 40*Lvl damage before it will be destroyed. Name substance when purchased.

field.name: Description
field.text: Purchase per attribute that is at least a 20. Increase the max attribute to 20 +lvl2, and purchase additional points as if the base attribute is 12 the current attribute.

field.name: Description
field.text: You recive +2 to all Dex checks involving balance, jumping, or remaining standing.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can teleport up toLvl2* 5 miles away that he can see or has been.

field.name: Description
field.text: You do not fall unconcious when you drop below 0 HP

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can transfer Lvl HP to a target per second. Requires Touch

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can transferLvl2* 5 MP to a target per second. Requires Touch

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can initiate a grip that requires a strength of STR+Lvl2. Adds Level to any grappling skill.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can walk on air. He can walk up air steps, go over air bridges, even create air walls (for himself only).

field.name: Description
field.text: Acts as an 8th level skill in ONE weapon, no other weapon skills may be bought by the character

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can control the weather (basic stuff here, no tornadoes, huricanes, etc) for an area ofLvl2square miles.

field.name: Description
field.text: When whirlwind is active, the character appears to be an opaque tornado (think Tasmanian Devil here). All projectiles will be deflected. Anything that comes in contact with the character will receive 36+2C damage.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can withstand high and low pressure environments. This includes a vacuum and underwater.

field.name: Description
field.text: Character can see through any substance that is no more thanLvl2feet thick.
